root.name: Mig-29 Soviet Fighter
root.description: OverviewMig-29 Soviet Fighter is an action game developed by Codemasters and published by Camerica for the NES, ZX Spectrum, Amiga, Atari ST, and Commodore 64 platforms.International switchOne of Camerica's releases that featured a switch on the back of the shiny silver cartridge to allow play in both U.S. and European NES units.
